warning.quota_exceeded:
Dear user,

It seems that you have reached the maximum number of uses of smart functions for this month. In order to ensure a fair distribution of resources among all our users and maintain a high quality of service, we unfortunately have to limit the frequency of their use.

Thank you for your understanding.
warning.unknown_error: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.
warning.token_expired: It seems that your login has expired. Please log in again to continue.
warning.unauthorized: It seems that you are not authorized to use the smart functions. Please log in to your account to use them.

not_logged_in.message:
Dear reader,

to fully utilize all the smart features of our digital library, including reading aloud, translations and summarization, you must be logged in.

sp.title: Digital Library
sp.message: Thousands of digitized documents from Czech libraries, all in one place.

main.public: Search in public documents in the digital library
main.collection_with_filters: Search in the collection with filters

e1.desc: wildcard for any exactly one character, e.g.

e2.desc: wildcard for any number of any characters, e.g.

e3.desc: logical operator for the occurrence of both expressions, e.g.

e4.desc: logical operator for the occurrence of at least one of the expressions, e.g.

e7.desc: proximity search - terms are separated by a maximum of n positions, e.g.

search.inaccessible_document: The document is not publicly accessible

music.inaccessible_track: The track is not publically accessible

window.title: You do not have access to this document
window.message1: The document is available under the licenses:
window.default_text: This document cannot be viewed freely in accordance with Act No. 121/2000 Coll. (Copyright Act). The Copyright Act allows works to be made available 70 years after the death of all authors (including the translator, illustrator, etc.) and 50 years from publication of the work.

alert.no_results_found: No results found. Please, try a different query.
alert.book_no_results: The searched text was not found on any page of the document.

viewer_page.region_selection_help: Select region by dragging the mouse

pdf-dialog.tip_shift: Hint: with pressed Shift key you can select multiple pages at once
pdf-dialog.warning_too_manny_pages: The maximum number of pages is exceeded
pdf-dialog.warning_generate: Creating the PDF document can take several minutes depending on the number of selected pages.

metadata-dialog.title: Metadata for
metadata-dialog.missing: Object {{ model }} does not contain {{ resource }}

admin-dialog.remove_from_col_message: Do you really want to remove the selected objects from the collection
admin-dialog.add_to_col_message: You really want to add the selected objects to the collection
admin-dialog.remove_licence_message: Do you really want to remove the license from the selected objects? License:
admin-dialog.add_licence_message: Do you really want to add a license to the selected objects? License:

private_sheetmusic.message: Unfortunately, it is not allowed to copy copyright-protected sheet music in any way due to an exception in the Copyright Act.

private_document_pdf.message: It is not allowed to generate PDF from copyrighted documents.

private_document_jpeg.message: The page is not publically accessible.

missing_alto.message: The selected region cannot be converted to text because the structured text transcription is missing for the page.

cookiebar.title: We use cookies
cookiebar.message: We use cookies to provide you with the best user experience possible. We need your consent to process them. Thank you for giving us your consent. This helps us improve the site.

functional.label: Required
functional.description: The necessary cookies ensure that the website is usable by enabling basic functions such as site navigation and access to secure sections of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

preferential.label: Preferential
preferential.description: Preferred cookies allow a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks. This is the preferred language, for example.

analytical.label: Analytical
analytical.description: Analytical cookies help us to understand how visitors use the website. They help us improve the way the website works, for example by making it easy for users to find what they are looking for. These cookies do not collect information that could identify you.

folders.warning: You need to sign in to manage lists.

dialogs.delete_folder_message: Do you really want to delete the list
dialogs.add_to_folder_message: Insert list UUIDs separated by commas
dialogs.follow_message: Do you really want to follow the list
dialogs.unfollow_message: Do you really want to unfollow the list
dialogs.batch_delete_message: Do you want to delete selected documents from the list?
dialogs.share_warning_message: You need to sign in to add the list.

tts.title: Text-to-speech
tts.text1: The listed languages will not be translated and the text will be read in the original language.
tts.text2: The remaining languages will be translated and read in the primary language.
tts.text3: Text-to-speech is available only for public documents.
